attributes.action: For David Cameron to retract his resignation as Prime Minister and lead EU exit.
attributes.background: David Cameron is the only man capable of ensuring Britain gets the best deal when exiting the European Union. He should retract his resignation and continue to safeguard the British economy with dignity and clarity. British people still back him as the man to lead Britain.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.
